alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued March 08 at 2:08PM PST until March 09 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. * WHERE...Northwestern Mendocino Interior and Northeastern Mendocino Interior Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Mendocino Interior; Northwestern Mendocino Interior
